title: Combustion
description: Introductory chemical kinetics, deformations and deflagrations, laminar flame propagation in premixed gases, ignition and quenching, laminar diffusion flames, droplet burning, and turbulent reacting flows. Crosslisted with AE 6766.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 6304 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 6765 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 6765 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
